cancel.title: Cancel Room creation?
cancel.description: All your settings will be lost.

templateLinks.title: Drag & Drop circles to the right places / Click on link to edit

uploadBackground.title: Upload your Room background
uploadBackground.description: upload or drop and drag a file

youtubeBackground.title: Use a Youtube url for your Room background
youtubeBackground.description: Copy & Paste a Youtube url here

form.monetizationContent: collect entry fees, donations or payments

editPositions.tooltip: Drag & Drop users to the right places

editPrivacy.title: publish

private.title: Create Private Room
private.availability: the Room will be available for you in My Rooms
private.editable: you can edit the Room anytime
private.changePrivacyPossibility: you can make the Room public anytime

public.title: Create Public Room
public.availability: the Room will be available for everyone in Ruume library
public.editable: once created, you will not be able to edit the Room
public.changePrivacyPossibility: once created, you will not be able to make the Room private

editPrivacy.link: Please be respectful of our Terms. Public rooms must be safe for work
editPrivacy.upgradePlan: To create public rooms, you should upgrade to Professional plan or Business plan. Upgrade now or create a private room, upgrade your plan later and then change your private room into a public one.

tooltips.saveRuume: publish your ruume for later use
tooltips.schedule: schedule a meeting in your new ruume

upgrade.linkDescription2: place links anywhere in the ruume for high clickthrough rates
